facts: David sold his house to Emily with a valid deed on January 1
David then sold the same house to Frank on February 1
Frank had no knowledge of the earlier sale and recorded his deed immediately
asp_facts: property(prop1). first_sale(prop1, david, emily, jan1). first_deed_recorded(prop1, no). second_sale(prop1, david, frank, feb1). second_deed_recorded(prop1, yes). second_buyer_good_faith(prop1, yes). second_buyer_notice(prop1, no).
question: Who has superior title to the property?
rationale: Under recording statutes in most jurisdictions, a subsequent bona fide purchaser who records first takes priority over an earlier unrecorded deed. Frank has superior title.
